actuallyharvest.configuration.allowempty: Allow harvesting with empty hand. If disabled, requires hoe.
actuallyharvest.configuration.allowfakep: Allow machines, like Create's deployer, to harvest crops.
actuallyharvest.configuration.blacklistc: List of crops to blacklist from right-click harvest. Format: "modid:block"
actuallyharvest.configuration.blacklisth: List of held items to blacklist from right-click harvest. Format: "modid:item"
actuallyharvest.configuration.blacklistm: List of mods to blacklist from right-click harvest. Format: "modid"
actuallyharvest.configuration.expandhoer: Expand hoe range based on tier.
Expand hoe range by 1 for each level of efficiency enchantment level.
actuallyharvest.configuration.harvestabl:
Blocks that right clicking should simulate click instead of breaking.
For blocks like berry bushes that have built-in right click harvest.

Harvestable crops.
Format: "harvestState[,afterHarvest]", i.e. "minecraft:wheat[age=7]"
or "minecraft:cocoa[age=2,facing=north],minecraft:cocoa[age=0,facing=north]"
WARNING: If autoConfigMods is set to false, only crops defined here will work.
If not, it will just add to the auto-configured list.
actuallyharvest.configuration.hightierex: Regular hoe (gold, wood, iron) expansion range.
actuallyharvest.configuration.hoeitems.d:
List of individual hoe tools and their harvest tier. This is for modded items not covered.
Format: minecraft:wooden_hoe-0 (with number being tier)
actuallyharvest.configuration.maxhoeexpa:
Maximum range hoe can expand for harvesting.
This is the maximum of tier + efficiency enchantment.
actuallyharvest.configuration.smalltiere: Regular hoe (gold, wood, iron) expansion range.
actuallyharvest.configuration.title: Actually Harvest
actuallyharvest.configuration.xpfromharv: Amount of XP dropped on harvest.
Chance of XP dropping on harvest.
Range of XP dropped on harvest. Format: "min-max", example: "0-3"
Use range for XP drop, instead of set amount.
